home.title: Denmark Intern
home.subtitle: Connect Danish Companies with Swedish Interns

hero.headline: Hire Swedish interns, simply — for Danish companies.
hero.subheadline: Fast, low-friction matching across the Øresund. Minimal fee. Real impact.
hero.story: Mikkel, a hiring manager in Copenhagen, has a roadmap full of ideas but not enough hands. Across the Øresund, Lina in Malmö is looking for a meaningful internship to launch her career. Denmark Intern bridges this gap—matching Danish teams with motivated Swedish interns in days, not months.
